basicInfo.name: Ballista
basicInfo.flavor: Because of her impressive skills, Ballista was recruited into the special forces of the Shadow Clan. The other clan members gave her a new nickname after seeing her in action.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Shadow of Death
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - Activates again with 70% power upon defeating an enemy with damage from this skill.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Activates again with 100% power.

Passive.name: Deathbringer's Daughter
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Camouflage. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 25% chance to do a Follow-Up Attack. [Always Active]
 - 1 Enemy When Doing a Follow-Up
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - All Enemies
 - Deals 1100 Fixed damage 1 time(s) upon using any attack 4 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Chance: Follow-Up Attack chance becomes 30%.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 1485 Fixed damage.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: All Damage Nullification 1 time(s) upon using any attack 4 time(s).

Passive (Trans).name: Deathbringer's Daughter
Passive (Trans).desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals Fixed, Piercing damage equal to 110 5 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 110 Fixed damage.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Sera, snacks, chocolate candy, familiarity, mundaneness, quick snacks
profile.dislikes: Kyle, things that are difficult to eat, taunting, greasy things
profile.story: Because of her impressive skills, Ballista was recruited into the special forces of the Shadow Clan. The other clan members gave her a new nickname after seeing her in action.

basicInfo.name: Ballista
basicInfo.flavor: Ballista became friends with Sera, who was the only member of the Shadow Clan who treated her as a normal member.

basicInfo.name: Ballista
basicInfo.flavor: Ballista is the daughter of a high-ranking officer once known as the Deathbringer. and she was trained in the art of assassination from an early age. Within the Shadow Clan, though, many believe she was only accepted due to her father's reputation.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Shadow of Death
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 62% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - Activates again with 70% power upon defeating an enemy with damage from this skill.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 62% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Deathbringer's Daughter
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Camouflage. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 15% chance to do a Follow-Up Attack. [Always Active]
 - 1 Enemy When Doing a Follow-Up
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - All Enemies
 - Deals 510 Fixed damage 1 time(s) upon using any attack 4 time(s).

Passive (Trans).name: Deathbringer's Daughter
Passive (Trans).desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals Fixed, Piercing damage equal to 51 5 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 51 Fixed damage.
